en: Burning activates {0} faster\nBurning Duration lasts 1 tick longer
You can only equip one weapon at a time\nYou have a [color=#00ff00]4-Set Bonus[/color] for the weapon you have equipped (excluding Legendary’s penalty)
The max range of your weapons is increased by {0}. Two-thirds as effective on melee weapons. Higher range also slightly increases the cooldown of melee weapons because of the travel distance.
The max range of your weapons is reduced by {0}. Two-thirds as effective on melee weapons. Lower range also slightly decreases the cooldown of melee weapons because of the travel distance.
You can’t heal in any way during waves
Gain {0} material and XP for every living and despawned enemy at the end of a wave
Nullifies the the first 2+ damage hit taken each wave
Attacks have a {0} chance to deal {1}x{2} ({3}) burning damage\nEffects that already burn get +1 burn damage
